title: Inside the Parker - Surging White Sox, Potential Trade Deadline Deals, Betts Disappointment, Nats Shooting
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Surging White Sox, Potential Trade Deadline Deals, Betts Disappointment, Nats Shooting
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob is on the road in Chicago and discusses the surging White Sox, which star could be on the block at the trade deadline, Mookie Betts disappointing 2021 campaign, and Rob's story about attending the Nats game when a shooting occurred. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair and Betting on the Bases.

Guests: Chicago Cubs Beat Writer Russell Dorsey discusses the Cubs chances for a 2nd half surge, and if they are ready to sell at the trade deadline.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
